list.abs: He smiled lopsidedly ., 他歪着脸笑了.

auth_sentence.content: Chris was stooping and bobbing at Susan, smiling lopsidedly, self-deprecatory.

auth_sentence.content: For nearly a century, war has rolled lopsidedly over the world, crushing the innocent in their homes.
